title: When going into que for tutorial bots it showed just a black screen
body:
and i got a penalty for not selecting.
i go into tutorial games sometimes because i like to help new players and my friend has to go do soemthing for about 30 min.
my game crashes at the start of blind pick matches, but its never done that.

replies.body: This sounds like a network problem reaching the game server, further affirmed by this black screen because it can't download any assets.  It's really important to get that fixed up, otherwise the dodge timer can escalate.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and fix up that instability.  Let me know if that helps!
